mapper.sql: id, enterprise_name, enterprise_nickname, area, address, number, enterprise_charger, phone, remark, document, state, operator, operator_ip, operator_time
mapper.insert: insert into spot_check_enterprise (id, enterprise_name, enterprise_nickname, area, address, number, enterprise_charger, phone, remark, document, state, operator, operator_ip, operator_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterpriseCharger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update spot_check_enterprise
enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_nickname = #{enterpriseNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_charger = #{enterpriseCharger,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
document = #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update spot_check_enterprise set enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_nickname = #{enterpriseNickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_charger = #{enterpriseCharger,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, document = #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM spot_check_enterprise as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT * FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM spot_check_enterprise as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a WHERE a.id = #{id} order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
SELECT count(1) FROM spot_check_enterprise WHERE state = 1

SELECT * FROM spot_check_enterprise WHERE state = 1
limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}

SELECT count(1) FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM spot_check_enterprise as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterprise},'%') AND a.enterprise_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.nickname},'%')

SELECT * FROM (select a.*,b.name as area_name FROM spot_check_enterprise as a LEFT JOIN sys_area as b on a.area=b.id) as a WHERE 1=1
AND a.enterprise_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.enterprise},'%') AND a.enterprise_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.nickname},'%') order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
